classificationFamily.description: What kind of classificaiton family does this subset belong to

classificationType.description: What kind of classificaiton this is (Always Subset if present)

contactPerson.description: Contact info to the person responsible for this subset

description.description: The description of the information object

versionRationale.description: The reason for making this version of the information object.

createdDate.description: The date on which the information object was created

versions.description: Versions of the classification code set for different validity periods.

name.description: A term which designates a concept, in this case an information object. The identifying name will be the preferred designation. There will be many terms to designate the same information object, such as synonyms and terms in other languages.

owningSection.description: Statistics Norway Division responsible for the subset updates.

id.description: The global unique identifier (GUID) of the information object assigned by the owner agency.

lastModified.description: The date on which the object was last updated.

shortName.description: A short technical name (Avoid special characters not supported as variable names in common programming languages).

statisticalUnits.description: Statistical unit references a subset tagged with.

administrativeDetails.description: Administrative details (e.g. default language, documentation, localID, ...).

languageCode.description: The language code. Use only ISO 639-1 codes.

values.description: One or more values (a list) for this agentDetailType.
One or more values (a list) for this administrativeDetailType.
